title: Fix unreliable Geolocator implementation
body: The new Geolocator API and implementation is so unreliable, that it can't be used with any confidence in a product. Problems I have encountered:

comments.body: I've tried many things, including suggestions from StackOverflow and from MSDN forums.  Nothing seems to  lead to a reliable usage of the Geolocator - this includes my discoveries from the previous post.

I have discovered that putting a 30 second delay in before using the location API seems to make GetGeopositionAsync() methods reliable. Must be some sort of undocumented initialisation requirement of the location API. I'm not sure if it's the delay that has helped or the "task swap" caused by the delay i.e. all the app initialisation logic runs before returning to a continuation with the location api stuff.
